body:
Adding MoFEM (http://mofem.eng.gla.ac.uk) packages.  MoFEM is finite element library.

MoFEM core library is extendable and it comes with users modules, in this pull request only two users modules are added to spack. More will come in the future. 

Additional information for installation instruction for MoFEM with Spack is available here http://mofem.eng.gla.ac.uk/mofem/html/installation.html
title: add MoFEM packages
